Cloud Routing Matrix | ThinkGeo
Settings
The Cloud Routing Matrix service calculates the travel time or distance between each waypoint in a series of coordinates.
Matrix Type
Distance Unit
  • Add Location
  • Clear Locations
  • Remove Location

Add or clear the location(s) by right-clicking and choosing "Add Location" or "Clear Locations". Set the location by dragging their icons or right-clicking and choosing "Remove Location".

At least 3 locations should be added to generate distance matrix.

The max count of locations is 10.

There was a problem getting the cost matrix. Please try again.
